#summary What the plugin does and what is required to run it.

= Features =

  * Integrate with PCSX2
  * Emulate the SPU2 via SDL
  *


= Requirements To Run =

  * PCSX2 0.9.2 or greater

= Requirements To Develop =

  * Compilers that can be used:
    * MingW32 5.1.3 or greater
    * gcc 3.4.5 or greater
    * Visual C++ 2005 or greater
  * [url=http://www.libsdl.org]SDL[/url] 1.2.0 or greater
  * [url=http://www.sourceforge.net/projects/unittest-cpp]UnitTest++[/url] for automated testing
